# braintrustdata_acls (Data Source)

Lists Braintrust ACLs for an object using API-native filters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List ACLs for a specific object using API-native filters
data "braintrustdata_acls" "all" {
  object_id   = "project-123"
  object_type = "project"
  limit       = 50
}

output "acl_ids" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_acls.all.ids
}

output "acls" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_acls.all.acls
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `object_id` (String) The object ID to list ACLs for.
- `object_type` (String) The object type to list ACLs for.

### Optional

- `ending_before` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch ACLs before this ID.
- `limit` (Number) Optional max number of ACLs to return.
- `starting_after` (String) Optional pagination cursor to fetch ACLs after this ID.

### Read-Only

- `acls` (Attributes List) List of ACLs. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--acls))
- `ids` (List of String) List of returned ACL IDs.

<a id="nestedatt--acls"></a>
### Nested Schema for `acls`

Read-Only:

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the ACL was created.
- `group_id` (String) The group ID subject for this ACL, when set.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the ACL.
- `object_id` (String) The ID of the object the ACL applies to.
- `object_org_id` (String) The organization ID of the ACL object.
- `object_type` (String) The type of object the ACL applies to.
- `permission` (String) The permission granted by this ACL.
- `restrict_object_type` (String) Optional object type restriction for this ACL.
- `role_id` (String) The role ID subject for this ACL, when set.
- `user_id` (String) The user ID subject for this ACL, when set.
